Name: Auld Alliance
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel.
TOP with lemonade and briefly stir.
Review: An orange-influenced Scotch Sour served long and refreshing.
Nutrition: One serving of Auld Alliance contains 179 calories
